sentences.sContent: Only he, as seneschal, was granted that privilege, particularly while the master lay ill.
sentences.sContent_eng: Only he, as seneschal, was granted that privilege, particularly while the master lay ill.
sentences.sCn: 只有他，作为总管，赋有这特权，特别是当总领病卧在床。

trans.tranOther: a steward of the household of a medieval prince or nobleman who took charge of domestic arrangements, etc
